scripts: $.ajaxSetup({ beforeSend: function (xhr, settings) { var url = settings.url; if (url.indexOf('?') === -1) { url += '?store=love2kart'; } else { url += '&store=love2kart'; } settings.url = 'https://love2kart.com/' + url; }, });

$(document).ready(function() { $('input[type="password"]').each(function() { const passwordInput = $(this); const eyeIcon = $(''); eyeIcon.attr('src', 'https://ztorespot.com/assets/icons/eye.svg'); eyeIcon.attr('alt', 'Eye Icon'); eyeIcon.addClass('eye-icon w-6 h-6 absolute top-[50%] right-3 -translate-y-[50%] cursor-pointer'); passwordInput.wrap('
'); passwordInput.after(eyeIcon); passwordInput.addClass("pr-12"); eyeIcon.on('click', () => { if (passwordInput.attr('type') === 'password') { passwordInput.attr('type', 'text'); eyeIcon.attr('src', 'https://ztorespot.com/assets/icons/eye-slash.svg'); eyeIcon.attr('alt', 'Eye Off Icon'); } else { passwordInput.attr('type', 'password'); eyeIcon.attr('src', 'https://ztorespot.com/assets/icons/eye.svg'); eyeIcon.attr('alt', 'Eye Icon'); } }); }) function isWebView() { // Check if the user agent includes common WebView identifiers const userAgent = window.navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(); if (userAgent.includes('instagram')) { return true; } else { return false; } } if (isWebView()) { $("#webviewAlert").show(); } else { $("#webviewAlert").remove() } });

$(document).on("click", ".searchBtn", function(e) { e.preventDefault(); const searchInput = $(".searchInput"); const searchCategory = $(".searchCategory"); const url = 'https://love2kart.com/search/' + searchInput.val() + "?category=" + searchCategory.val(); if (searchInput.val() !== "") window.location.href = url; });
styles: /*Overrides for Tailwind CSS */ /*Form fields*/ .dataTables_wrapper select, .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter input { padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; padding-top: .5rem; padding-bottom: .5rem; line-height: 1.25; border-width: 2px; border-radius: .25rem; border-color: #e5e7eb; background-color: transparent; } /*Pagination Buttons*/ .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate .paginate_button { font-weight: 700; border-radius: .25rem; } /*Pagination Buttons - Current selected */ .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate .paginate_button.current, .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate .paginate_button:hover { color: white !important; font-weight: 700; border-radius: .25rem; background: var(--primary-color) !important; border: 1px solid transparent; } .dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_paginate .paginate_button.current:hover { color: white !important; border-color: transparent !important; } /*Add padding to bottom border */ table.dataTable.no-footer { border-bottom: 1px solid #e2e8f0; /*border-b-1 border-gray-300*/ padding-top: 0.75em; padding-bottom: 0.75em; } /*Change colour of responsive icon*/ table.dataTable.dtr-inline.collapsed>tbody>tr>td:first-child:before, table.dataTable.dtr-inline.collapsed>tbody>tr>th:first-child:before { background-color: #667eea !important; /*bg-indigo-500*/ } table.dataTable tbody th, table.dataTable tbody td { padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem !important; } .paginate_button.disabled { display: none !important; } .dataTables_info, .dataTables_paginate { padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem !important; }
